Class BackupVisitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mijecu25.personalbackup.visitors.BackupVisitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileVisitor, Runnable

    public class BackupVisitor
extends Object
implements Runnable, FileVisitor
    Recursive file tree visitor that backs up records and directories.
